name: brazucas-em-cork
description: Community web platform for Brazucas em Cork

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && npm run dev:server"
scripts.dev:windows: concurrently "cd frontend && set PORT=3002&& npm start" "cd backend && npm run dev:server"
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
